title: Sarah Sturm on Her Return to the Traka 360: ‘I Made a Mistake, So Here I Am To Try Again’
content:
The beloved American gravel pro was second in 2023 after fueling mishaps. She's back in Girona to give the 360-kilometer gravel race another go.

Read the full article at Sarah Sturm on Her Return to the Traka 360: ‘I Made a Mistake, So Here I Am To Try Again’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
